column4: even for an chrome-enthusiast like me, chrome gets eaten alive by its lack of addon support. google missed adding that alongside with a mac/linux client. hope it'll come the next months :>
google is adding grease monkey scripting support to chrome
and they could have waited another 3 years to release it until they had addons, but i'm glad they didn't
unfortunately they could have just replaced the few and depressing options we have to surf the net with that monster. i am afraid any sort of revolution will take years now
